Class ZoneListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.ZoneListener

  • public class ZoneListener
extends java.util.Observable
    Used to convey information between a zone and the GUI.

    1.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(int x,
          int y,
          java.lang.String side,
          java.lang.String state)
        Tells the GUI that a zone on the battlefield has been updated.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate of the zone
        y - Y-coordinate of the zone
        leftOrRight - Which gameboard the zone belongs to, 'left' for the AI player, 'right' for the human player.
        state - The state of the zone, 'hit', 'miss', 'sea', 'ship' or 'sunk'
